Package com.ivj.squirrelgame.board

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BoardView
    Interface with methods providing a view of the Board so positions can be evaluated without giving access to the underlying objects in this positions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    This class represents a 2d Board for a turn based Game, has a container for the entities which is linear, but a 2d representation can be created by flatten method.
    BoardConfig
    This class saves a configuration for a Board class with constants like width, height.
    FlattenedBoard
    Class representing a Board with a 2d container.
    XY
    Class representing a 2d vector with integers as coordinates.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BoardException
    General purpose exception related to Board class
    LocationOutOfBoundsException
    Exception thrown when trying to access Locations out of bounds.
